name: Ext_R2_Claim_fundsReserve
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.Claim.fundsReserve for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Claim.fundsReserve from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Claim|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: In the case of a Pre-Determination/Pre-Authorization the provider may request that funds in the amount of the expected Benefit be reserved ('Patient' or 'Provider') to pay for the Benefits determined on the subsequent claim(s). 'None' explicitly indicates no funds reserving is requested.
element.comment: `Claim.fundsReserve` maps to R4B `Claim.fundsReserve`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

element.definition: In the case of a Pre-Determination/Pre-Authorization the provider may request that funds in the amount of the expected Benefit be reserved ('Patient' or 'Provider') to pay for the Benefits determined on the subsequent claim(s). 'None' explicitly indicates no funds reserving is requested.
element.comment: `Claim.fundsReserve` maps to R4B `Claim.fundsReserve`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

binding.description: For whom funds are to be reserved: (Patient, Provider, None).
